title.en: A Supplication to the Successive Lives of Shechen Rabjam

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: You perfected the four aspirations1and blaze with the majesty of the two accumulations,
text.en-trans: mönlam zhi drub tsok nyi pal gyi ji

text.en: Aśokaśrī, sugata of the south-easterly buddhafield,
text.en-trans: deshek sharlhö zhing gön nya ngen mé

text.en: You who pacify the three poisons of infinite beings,
text.en-trans: tayé semchen duk sum zhidzé ching

text.en: Protector for all throughout the reaches of space, I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: khakhyab drowé gön gyur solwa deb

text.en: At the peak of Mount Malaya, you received from Vajrapāṇi, Holder of Secrets,
text.en-trans: ma la ya tser sangwé dakpo lé

text.en: The teachings of the Great Secret, mind mandate of Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: kunzang gonggyü sang chen tadak nö

text.en: And, realising it perfectly, became its custodian—
text.en-trans: lekpar ka dü malü tuk su chü

text.en: Yakṣa Ulkāmukha (Karda Dong), I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: nöjin karda dong la solwa deb

text.en: Magical, illusory manifestation of Mañjuśrītikṣṇa,
text.en-trans: jampal nönpö yeshe gyumé trul

text.en: Great spiritual friend who held the transmission of the Sugata Body2
text.en-trans: deshek ku yi kabab shenyen ché

text.en: And arranged the teachings of the naturally luminous Great Perfection into three sections—3
text.en-trans: ösal dzogchen dé sum tenpé sol

text.en: Mañjuśrīmitra, I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: jé khé mandzu mi trar solwa deb

text.en: To house the sacred relics of the Teacher,
text.en-trans: dzambüling dir tönpé ring sel ngö

text.en: You built eighty-four thousand stūpas in this world
text.en-trans: zhukpé chö dong gyé tri zhi tong zheng

text.en: And successfully sustained and spread his teachings—
text.en-trans: tönpé dzé jé né dang ten dar shul

text.en: Great illuminator, Aśoka, I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: sal dzé a sho kala solwa deb

text.en: Born into the family of the king and guided by Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: tsepö rik trung pemé tuk kyi zin

text.en: You honoured sublime lotsāwas and paṇḍitas, supported Dharma translation,
text.en-trans: lo pen kyechok nyenkur damchö gyur

text.en: And wrote an edict to promote the ten virtuous deeds—
text.en-trans: gé chü sol zung ka tsik dri té zhak

text.en: Prince Senalek, I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: gyalsé sé na lek la solwa deb

text.en: You followed Padmasambhava, reached a lofty stage of accomplishment,
text.en-trans: pemé jezung drubpé sa tor shek

text.en: And translated various tantric scriptures, such as the Do and Magical Display,4
text.en-trans: do dang gyutrul lasok ngak kyi zhung

text.en: Genuine lotsāwa,
text.en-trans: nam mang gyur dzé dön gyi lotsawa

text.en: Monk of Ma, Rinchen Chok, I supplicate you.5
text.en-trans: ma ben rinchen chok la solwa deb

text.en: The direct disciple of Śāntarakṣita, regent of the Muni,
text.en-trans: tubpé gyaltsab shanta rakshité

text.en: A paṇḍita who used scripture and reasoning to eradicate
text.en-trans: ngölob gangjong gyalten nyok ma kün

text.en: Impurity from the Buddha's teaching in the Land of Snows—6
text.en-trans: lung dang rigpé sal dzé pandita

text.en: Kamalaśīla, at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: pemé ngang tsul zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You followed Hevajra Lotsāwa7and became
text.en-trans: gyé dzé lo tsé jezung chakgya ché

text.en: An accomplished yogin of Mahāmudrā, an ornament of the practice lineage's teaching,
text.en-trans: drubpé naljor drubgyü tenpé gyen

text.en: And crown jewel among hundreds of practitioners in the Land of Snow,
text.en-trans: gangjong drub gyé tsuk nor mi la jé

text.en: Lordly Milarepa Shepé Dorje, at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: zhepa dorjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With the light of intelligence you discerned all that can be known,
text.en-trans: khyen rab nangwé shejé chö künzik

text.en: With loving compassion you cared for countless disciples,
text.en-trans: tsé chen tukjé tayé dulja kyong

text.en: And your reputation for learning and righteousness spread far and wide—
text.en-trans: khé tsün drubpé drak nyen khyab dzepé

text.en: Great Rongtön,8at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: rong tön chenpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Holder of the transmission of profound termas, master of Dzogchen and Mahāmudrā,
text.en-trans: zabter kabab chakdzok tenpé dak

text.en: Dharma-king of Drikung, who, with wrathful Mañjuśrī’s roar,
text.en-trans: jampal tröpé ngarö lok sé dé

text.en: Overpowered all those whose attachment was misplaced—
text.en-trans: zilnön chö kyi gyalpo drigung pa

text.en: Rinchen Puntsok,9at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: rinchen püntsok zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You perfected the practice of approach and accomplishment from Orgyenpa and the early Kagyü tradition,10
text.en-trans: orgyen nyendrub kagyü gongmé sol

text.en: And, cherishing the life of a yogin, displayed miracles
text.en-trans: nyam zhé tar sön drubpé tulzhuk kyang

text.en: That brought Nepalis and Tibetans to the Dharma—
text.en-trans: dzutrul nga nyé bal bö chö la gyur

text.en: Ü-nyön Heruka,11I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: ü nyön heruka la solwa deb

text.en: The sun of Mañjuśrī’s intelligence arose in your mind,
text.en-trans: jampal khyen rab nyima tuk la shar

text.en: And, with the lion's roar of reasoning and scriptural citation,
text.en-trans: lung rik mawé sengé lok mé tsok

text.en: You outshone those who harboured wrong views—master of learning and spiritual accomplishment,
text.en-trans: zilnön khedrub wangchuk rabjam pa

text.en: Rabjampa Tenpé Gyaltsen,12at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: tenpé gyaltsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With the nine qualities of a sublime being,13you held the supreme teachings of the definitive secret,
text.en-trans: dampé tsul gü ngé sang ten chokdzin

text.en: And, with your wise and loving activity, spread them far and wide—
text.en-trans: khyen dang tsewé trinlé pata dal

text.en: Sun of the teachings of Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: kunzang tenpé nyima zhé chenpa

text.en: Nampar Gyalwa of Shechen,14at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: nampar gyalwé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Pure in the three higher trainings,15a veritable treasure of knowledge, love and ability,
text.en-trans: lab sum namdak khyen tsé nü pé ter

text.en: With the nectar of maturation and liberation, you brought hosts of fortunate disciples
text.en-trans: mindrol dütsi kalzang duljé tsok

text.en: To spiritual maturity—awareness-holder of the definitive meaning,
text.en-trans: yong min ngepa dön gyi rigpa dzin

text.en: Paljor Gyatso,16at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: paljor gyatsö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Prophesied by the master of Oḍḍiyāna as the owner of profound termas,
text.en-trans: orgyen lungten zabmö ter la wang

text.en: You engaged in yogic conduct and revealed hidden lands.
text.en-trans: tulzhuk chöpé bepé né zhal jé

text.en: Lord of the dance, whose yogic conduct arose from deep confidence in the creation and completion phases,
text.en-trans: kyedzok dingden ngak chö gar gyi wang

text.en: Chökyi Gyaltsen,17at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyaltsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Guided by Mañjuśrī-Yamāntaka,
text.en-trans: jampal shinjé shé kyi jesu zung

text.en: Your altruistic activities, through the four means of gathering disciples, were inconceivable,18
text.en-trans: zhenpen du zhi trinlé sam mikhyab

text.en: And, having perceived the unchanging truth, you brought benefit to all with a connection—
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden gyurmé ngedön zik

text.en: Kunzang Tenpé Nyima,19I supplicate you.
text.en-trans: kunzang tenpé nyimar solwa deb

text.en: A friend, who through the magnificent conduct of a bodhisattva,
text.en-trans: lab chen gyalwé sé kyi chöpa yi

text.en: Caused the precious teachings of Buddha to illuminate this world,
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen zhing dir nangwé nyen

text.en: Accomplished vajra holder, subduer of the difficult-to-tame,
text.en-trans: dul ka dul dzé drubpé dorjé dzin

text.en: Tenpé Nima,20at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: tenpé nyimé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Through the kindness of the gentle protector Rabsel Dawa,21
text.en-trans: rimé ten drö gön gyur terchen jé

text.en: Treasure lord and unbiased protector of the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: jam gön rabsal dawé tukkyé kyi

text.en: You became an excellent repository of the accomplishment and explanation of the Ancient Translations of definite freedom—
text.en-trans: ngé drol ngagyur shedrub chuter ché

text.en: Chökyi Senge,22at your feet I supplicate.
text.en-trans: yik dzin chö kyi sengér solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of making this supplication with unshakeable devotion,
text.en-trans: detar miché güpé soltab tü

text.en: May I be guided by the sublime protectors of this garland-like succession of lives
text.en-trans: tserab trengwar dampé gön nam kyi

text.en: And through serving them well through the three means of gratification,23
text.en-trans: jezung nyepa sum gyi lek nyenpé

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that all my wishes and the twofold aims may be spontaneously fulfilled.
text.en-trans: dön nyi sam kün lhündrub jingyi lob
